title: 820-00928 keyboard issue
message:
Arrived with liquid damage around UB300. 

After replacing UB300 board powers on and boots now however there is a issue with the keyboard. Whatever key is pressed the board will act as if you are continuously pressing it down.

Tried known good top case and cables but no change. What should be checked? The rest of the board is in pristine condition including J4500/4501

title: 820-00928 keyboard issue
message:
Did you test with USB macOS?
If you press same key again, it will stop to repeat?

Just in case, check KBD_INT_L behavior.
